document_data.name: Ship Suljack
document_data.mainbody: '''Ship Suljack''' was one of the five factions of [[Luskan]] ruled by a [[High Captains (Luskan)|High Captain]]. It was named for and originally led by [[Suljack]].
document_data.Relationships: Ship Suljack was allied with [[Ship Rethnor]] in [[1376 DR]].
document_data.History:
Ship Suljack was the only Ship represented when Captain [[Deudermont]] proclaimed his plan for the new city of Luskan in [[1376 DR]]. Suljack was killed by [[Athrogate]], by the order of High Captain [[Kensidian]] of [[Ship Rethnor]], soon after.

''Circa'' [[1490 DR]], pirates of Ship Suljack were involved in smuggling of a highly addictive and illegal substance known as the ''[[traveler's dust]]''. The substance was considered dangerous contraband even in relatively lawless places, like [[Luskan]]. [[Thoradin]] was involved in the smuggling operation for Ship Suljack.
document_data.Members:
* [[Suljack]], leader and cousin to High Captain [[Rethnor]].
* [[Dagmaer Suljack]], Third High Captain of Luskan as of [[1489 DR]].
